perturbation.original_text: 1.56 "Specialty" shall mean (i) Target Professionals with a primary or secondary specialty designation of Gastroenterology, Colorectal Surgery or Proctology (excluding any such Target Professionals with a primary or secondary specialty designation of Hepatology (including Transplant Hepatology), in each case, as determined by data reported by Dova's Third Party Data Source, subject to any adjustments determined pursuant to the process set out in Section 6.5, and (ii) all healthcare professionals with Nurse or Physician Assistant specialty designations affiliated with the Target Professionals described in subsection (i), as adjusted.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.56 "Specialty" shall mean (i) Target Professionals with a primary or secondary specialty designation of Gastroenterology, Colorectal Surgery or Proctology, including those with Hepatology (including Transplant Hepatology) designations, in each case, as determined by internal sales data reported by Valeant's sales representatives, and (ii) all healthcare professionals with Nurse or Physician Assistant specialty designations affiliated with the Target Professionals described in subsection (i), as adjusted.
perturbation.explanation: This change broadens the definition of 'Specialty' to include Target Professionals with Hepatology designations, directly contradicting the original definition that excludes them. Additionally, it replaces Dova's Third Party Data Source with internal sales data reported by Valeant, altering the data source used to determine specialty, which introduces further uncertainty. This change creates an in-text contradiction because section 4.1.1 states, Valeant shall conduct the Valeant Activities for the Product in the Specialty in the Field. By changing the original definition and removing the exclusivity in the specialty, can change in the scope of Valeant Activities and potentially impact royalties.
perturbation.contradicted_text: 4.1.1 General. Valeant shall conduct the Valeant Activities for the Product in the Specialty in the Field in the Territory in accordance with this Agreement.

perturbation.original_text: 4.4.1 Training, Training Materials and Promotional Materials. (a) Subject to the terms of this Section 4.4.1, Dova shall prepare and control the content of (i) all Product training materials for Field Force Personnel (the "Product Training Materials") and (ii) all Product marketing and educational materials (the "Promotional Materials") (the Product Training Materials and the Promotional Materials, collectively, the "Product Materials"). Dova shall be solely responsible for ensuring that the Product Materials prepared and approved by it are in compliance with the Regulatory Approval for the Product, the Product Labeling and Applicable Law.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.4.1 Training, Training Materials and Promotional Materials. (a) Subject to the terms of this Section 4.4.1, Valeant shall have the right to modify Product training materials for Field Force Personnel (the "Product Training Materials") and all Product marketing and educational materials (the "Promotional Materials") (the Product Training Materials and the Promotional Materials, collectively, the "Product Materials"). Valeant shall use its own discretion to ensure that the Product Materials prepared and approved by it are in compliance with the Regulatory Approval for the Product, the Product Labeling and Applicable Law.
perturbation.explanation: By altering Section 4.4.1(a) and providing Valeant the right to modify Product training materials for Field Force Personnel, contradicts the original definition of Dova having sole responsibility for the content of training and marketing materials (the Product Materials). The original contract gives Dova control over the Product Materials. This could allow Valeant to create materials that aren't aligned with Dova's intended messaging. This is an in-text contradiction because it directly conflicts with Section 4.5.1 Activities of Field Force Personnel that states, Valeant shall instruct and cause the Field Force Personnel that are engaged in Detailing to use only the Product Labeling and, subject to the terms of Section 4.4, Product Materials approved by Dova for the conduct of the Valeant Activities for the Product and consistent with Applicable Laws.
perturbation.contradicted_text: 4.5.1 Activities of Field Force Personnel. Valeant hereby agrees and acknowledges that the following shall apply with respect to itself and the Field Force Personnel that are engaged in Detailing: (a) Valeant shall instruct and cause the Field Force Personnel that are engaged in Detailing to use only the Product Labeling and, subject to the terms of Section 4.4, Product Materials approved by Dova for the conduct of the Valeant Activities for the Product and consistent with Applicable Laws. Valeant shall instruct the Field Force Personnel that are engaged in Detailing to, and will monitor the Field Force Personnel that are engaged in Detailing to ensure that such Field Force Personnel, limit their claims of efficacy and safety for the Product to those claims which are consistent with and do not exceed the Product Labeling and any Promotional Materials.

perturbation.original_text: 5.8 Booking of Sales Revenues. Dova shall retain ownership of the rights to the Product and record on its books all revenues from sales of the Product. Dova shall be exclusively responsible for accepting and filling purchase orders, billing, and returns with respect to the Product.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.8 Booking of Sales Revenues. Valeant shall share ownership of the rights to the Product and record on its books all revenues from sales of the Product. Valeant shall be jointly responsible for accepting and filling purchase orders, billing, and returns with respect to the Product.
perturbation.explanation: By changing Section 5.8 and making Valeant jointly responsible for accepting and filling purchase orders, billing and returns for the product it introduces ambiguity and is conflicting with the the original text stating, Dova shall be exclusively responsible for accepting and filling purchase orders, billing, and returns with respect to the Product. By changing the responsibilities of Sales Revenues, creates an in-text contradiction since this can cause issues in Financial Provisons. 6.  Financial Provisons talks about calculations of the Promotional Fees and by not assigning the proper roles of Sales and Revenues can impact financial accounting of the product
